title: Arannis the Swift
description: Elven Ranger: A skilled archer with keen senses and agility.
quote: Swift as the wind, silent as the night.

title: Thorin Ironfist
description: Dwarven Warrior: A stout warrior with unmatched strength and endurance.
quote: Through stone and steel, I endure.

title: Sir Galahad the Brave
description: Human Paladin: A holy knight who protects the weak and vanquishes evil.
quote: In the light, I stand firm.

title: Gruk Bloodfury
description: Orc Berserker: A ferocious fighter driven by rage and fury.

title: Eldrin the Wise
description: Mystic Sorcerer: A powerful spellcaster who wields arcane magic.
quote: Magic is the key to the universe.
